alert.note: Alert for Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 1:42PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Miami-Dade County through 215 PM EDT... At 142 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm over Zoo Miami, or near Kendall, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Miami, Coral Gables, Key Biscayne, South Miami, Black Point, Kendall, The Redland, Doral, Pinecrest, Miami Springs, Sweetwater, West Miami, Medley, Westchester, Naranja, Glenvar Heights, Palmetto Bay, University Of Miami, Zoo Miami and Goulds. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Miami Dade County; Inland Miami-Dade County; Metropolitan Miami Dade
